metadata.description: A special preview edition of the original graphic novel BATMAN: EARTH ONE by the fan-favorite creative team of writer Geoff Johns and artist Gary Frank (SUPERMAN: SECRET ORIGIN, SHAZAM)! Also includes a special preview of BATMAN #1 by Scott Snyder and Greg Capullo as part of DC Comics' line-wide relaunch The New 52!
metadata.name: Batman: Earth One
